text: The 2008–09 season was Hartlepool United's 100th year in existence and their second consecutive season in League One. Along with competing in League One, the club also participated in the FA Cup, League Cup and League Trophy. The season covers the period from 1 July 2008 to 30 June 2009. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ==Transfers== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%; text-align: center;" |- !
